column4: I have a server running Feisty - so pretty old. What would the best steps be to upgrade it to jaunty? I'd prefer not to reinstall completely because I'd like to keep my server settings alive
anything new. Where I can still get updates. apt doesn't work anymore :(
if you don't want to upgrade every 6 months, you should upgrade to the latest LTS (Hardy) and stay there until the next LTS
